pieces.title: Prelude in C Major
pieces.subtitle: from The Well-Tempered Clavier, Book I
pieces.description: A masterclass in harmony and finger dexterity. Perfect for developing evenness of touch and finger independence.

pieces.title: Für Elise
pieces.subtitle: Bagatelle No. 25 in A minor
pieces.description: Excellent for teaching delicate melodic touch, pedal control, and contrasts between lyrical and agitated sections.

pieces.title: Waltz in A minor
pieces.description: A perfect introduction to Chopin. Teaches waltz rhythm and the concept of rubato.

pieces.title: Piano Sonata No. 11 in A Major
pieces.subtitle: 1st Movement - Andante grazioso
pieces.description: A brilliant study in theme and variations. Develops precision, clarity, and articulation.

pieces.title: Nocturne in E-flat Major
pieces.description: Teaches how to project a singing melody. Demands sophisticated pedaling and control of dynamics.

pieces.title: Lágrima
pieces.subtitle: Preludio
pieces.description: A foundational piece for developing tone and expressive playing on classical guitar.

pieces.title: Romance
pieces.subtitle: Spanish Romance
pieces.description: The quintessential piece for developing right-hand arpeggio technique with thumb melody.

pieces.title: Study in B minor
pieces.description: A masterclass in arpeggios, requiring the player to bring out a hidden melody within the pattern.

pieces.title: Prelude No. 1
pieces.subtitle: in E minor
pieces.description: A cornerstone of modern repertoire. Develops powerful arpeggio and lyrical playing.

pieces.title: Recuerdos de la Alhambra
pieces.description: The definitive technical study for tremolo technique. Requires immense right-hand stamina.
